intro1: I’m Paul Cravayat, a front-end developer & UX designer. I craft digital interfaces for people, with strong emphasis on design, typography and animations.
intro2: After spending a few years in agencies in Paris, Madagascar and Cambodia, I’m currently based in sunny Marseille and working as a freelancer.
txtApo: double-screen experience for backing up broadcast of Apocalypse documentary on French TV.
txtDior: Temporary website for the launch of the advertising campaign of Dior Homme flagrances.
txtSally: Interactive music video for the band "In the Can". Hold on space bar to turn the wheel and discover all the scenes !
txtGn: Portfolio of Guillaume Nicollet, artistic director at ultranoir agency.
txtPav: Interactive installation in the museum of urbanism of Paris, for the "Nuits Blanches" festival
